full_summary:
::: InfoBlock
### Tender Announcement
**Title (English)/Titre (Français)**: F3065-220346 - Refurbishing of Circuit Breakers Westinghouse DSL-416 and DSL-208 type - CCGS Pierre Radisson
**Reference Number (English)/Numéro de Référence (Français)**: WS3768295210-Doc3768443550

**Amendment History**
* **Number of Amendments**: 4
* **Last Amendment Date**: January 9, 2023

**Tender Details**
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Type of Tender**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not Applicable
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

**Important Deadlines**
* **Publication Date**: December 2, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2023 (2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 21, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2023

**Contact Information**
* **Contact Name (English)/Nom de Contact (Français)**: Gabriel Piras (SPAC)
* **Contact Email (English)/Courriel de Contact (Français)**: gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL (English)/URL de l'avis (Français)**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14799045?extsite=MTQ3OTkwNDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Detailed Tender Description**
A complete upgrade and reconditioning of four (4) DSL type circuit breakers, currently in operation on the CCGS Pierre Radisson located in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada, is being sought through this Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation. Annex A provides detailed specifications and requirements.
:::
 
 Note that I made minor adjustments to some items to ensure there were not 2 description fields, only one is kept. Also,
